title: Revel Eats
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Gluten-free and health focused eatery offering salads, bowls, sandwiches, and fresh juices. There are vegetarian items including the bip 'n bop bowl (cauliflower rice, tofu, veggies); buddha's burrito, and roasted root bowls. Daily brunch options with the waffles being vegan and soyrizo is offered for omelette (egg, no tofu). Parking available in the adjacent garage.
